title: Questionnaire CCARS Hope Rating
description: Extent to which a person is optimistic about future outcomes.

concept.display: Openly expresses hope for the future and is making efforts to achieve better outcomes
Openly expresses hope for the future, but is not currently making efforts that would lead to better outcomes
Expresses both positive and negative attitudes in regard to future outcomes
Does not express hope for the future, but may be convinced that there is opportunity for better outcomes
Actively expresses hopelessness about future change
